interface-status.description: Display IGMP/MLD status information on interfaces.

status.description: Operational state of IGMP/MLD on interfaces.

address.description: Specify the IP address of an interface.

state.description: Specify the status of an interface enabled with a protocol.

negotiate-query-interval.description: Interval negotiated by non-queriers for sending query messages. The negotiated value is supported by IGMPv3 only.

other-querier-timeout.description: Specify the timeout period of other queriers. The value is 0 on the interface that acts as the querier.

maximum-response-time.description: Specify the maximum response time carried in a query message.

last-member-query-time.description: Specify the timeout period for sending the last-member query message.

startup-query-interval.description: Specify the interval at which an interface functioning as the querier sends query messages when it is started.

startup-query-count.description: Specify the number of times that an interface functioning as the querier sends query messages when it is started.

querier-address.description: Specify the address of a querier.

is-local-querier.description: Whether a query is a local query.

joins.description: Specify the number of groups that an interface has joined. When the interface joins a new group, the value increases by one; when the interface leaves a group, the value remains unchanged.

leaves.description: Specify the number of groups that the interface leaves. Each time when the interface leaves a group, the value increases by one.

negotiated-robustness.description: Specify the robustness variable negotiated by non-queriers. The value is supported by IGMPv3 only.

startup-query-timer-state.description: Specify the status of the timer for the interface functioning as the querier after being started. off: The interface immediately sends a query message after being started. on: The interface does not send a query message after being started.

other-querier-present-timer-state.description: Specify the status of the timer identifying whether another querier is present. Off: The interface considers itself as a querier and that no other queriers exist.

total-group-reported.description: Specify the number of groups that the interface dynamically joins. When an interface dynamically joins a new multicast group, the value increases by one.

display-static-groups.description: List of static multicast group information.

display-static-group.description: Operational state of static multicast group.

interface.description: Specify the name of an interface.

group-address.description: Specify a multicast group address. In the case of an IPv4, the value is in dotted decimal notation and ranges from 224.0.1.0 to 239.255.255.255; in the case of an IPv6 address, the value is in hexadecimal notation and in the format of FFxA:xxxx:xxxx::xxxx (x ranges from 0 to F and A can be 0, or in the range of 3 to F).

source-address.description: Specify the address of a multicast source.

is-configured-boundary.description: Whether the multicast forwarding boundary is configured.

interface.description: Specify the name of an interface.

group-address.description: Specify a multicast group address. In the case of an IPv4 address, the value is in dotted decimal notation and ranges from 224.0.1.0 to 239.255.255.255; in the case of an IPv6 address, the value in hexadecimal notation and in the format of FFxA:xxxx:xxxx::xxxx (x ranges from 0 to F and A can be 0, or in the range of 3 to F).

last-report-address.description: Specify the host that sends the last report message.

up-time.description: Specify the time when a multicast group is discovered, in seconds.

expire-time.description: Specify the scheduled time to remove a group from the group table. The value is expressed in seconds.

last-member-query-counter.description: Specify the number of times that the last member query message is transmitted.

last-member-query-timer.description: Specify the timeout period for sending last member query messages.

source-filter-mode.description: Specify the group mode, exclude or include.

v1-host-timer.description: Specify the timeout period of an v1 host.

v2-host-timer.description: Specify the timeout period of an v2 host.

source-address.description: Specify the address of a multicast source.

up-time.description: Specify the time when a multicast source is discovered.

expire-time.description: Specify the time left to delete records from the source table.

last-member-query-counter.description: Specify the number of times that the last member query message is transmitted.

last-member-query-timer.description: Specify the timeout period for sending last member query messages.
